attributes.action: REDUCE TRAVEL TAX THE PEOPLE ARE SPEAKING NOW
attributes.additional_details:
The Rate of this criminal Travel Tax is appaling, it is just Cash Cowing the Populus, it has no relevance to travel Industry.

The People of this Country need affordable Travel to the extent that in most cases the Tax outways the actual airfare costing.

The People have a right to Holiday with Family without having heavy Tax on Travel plans, as in a lot of cases Families have to forgo the Luxury of a Holiday due to the cost of Travel Tax.

People in this Country work hard and are entitled to movement in/out of this country without being penalised for the movement in question, many of the People work hard and pay their due Taxes in the normal daily routine, to Tax at this level for leisure is criminal in its context.

We Now Call On The Prime Minister & Government to Play fair within their Polices on this Subject.
